String.string: Defeat Hellgrammite with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat Gossamer Regent with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat Hellgrammite with a summoned Priest.
Defeat Gossamer Regent with a summoned Priest.
Destroy the Summoning Stone and summon a helper.
You can find Divine Pylons on both sides of the entrance. Destroy the pylons from within 10m when needed.
The dungeon is now closed. Type '/reset' or use the 'Reset Instances' button in your Character Profile (P).
The 10-minute timer starts when Nightmare Gossamer Regentâ€™s HP falls below 75%. When the timer hits zero, Nightmare Gossamer Regent will launch a devastating wipe-out attack.
Use essential and optional consumables before combat.
You can buy these items from the <font color = '#FFFF00'>Training Dungeon Merchant</font> by the entrance to where each Boss is.
